item.title: Netzwerkfr端hst端ck: Open Source in der Verwaltung
item.description: Netzwerkfr端hst端ck: Open Source in der Verwaltung # Networking breakfast: Open Source in public admin (at German “Smart country convention” Berlin). Back in August, in the middle of my vacation, I got an e-mail from plain schwarz asking if I would be willing to give a brief talk at an event they were organising about open source. All I needed to do was get back to them within a week and coordinate in a quick call.
